柔道 | JDP
Budō Lineage Tree

Kobayashi Kiyoshi

小林清

JPN

* 1925 Gunma Japan - † 2013 Japan

Open in tree ID page Source YAML

Kobayashi Kiyoshi (小林清) was the «father» of Portuguese Judo and one of the founders of the Portuguese Judo Federation, and the greatest promoter of Judo in Portugal. Sensei Kobayashi was one of the highest grades in the world, 9th dan given Kodokan by in 1999.

Teachers

  • Mifune Kyūzō -> Kobayashi Kiyoshi 三船 久蔵 (Kōdōkan Jūdō)

Students

  • Kobayashi Kiyoshi -> Karl Geis 小林清
  • Kobayashi Kiyoshi -> Hal Sharp 小林清
  • Kobayashi Kiyoshi -> José Costa Branco 小林清
  • Kobayashi Kiyoshi -> Henrique Nunes 小林清
  • Kobayashi Kiyoshi -> Fernando Costa Matos 小林清
  • Kobayashi Kiyoshi -> José Manuel Bastos Nunes 小林清
  • Kobayashi Kiyoshi -> Alexandre Gueifão 小林清
  • Kobayashi Kiyoshi -> Frigyes Tӧrӧk 小林清

Rank

  • Kōdōkan Jūdō 講道館柔道 : 9 dan ( Kodokan )
